website_summaries.verdict: An affordable billiards table cover meant for basic surface protection to keep off dust.
pros: Elastic bands on the corners help create a solid seal around the edges of a billiards table
Keeps sides of the table protected as well
cons: Cloth construction does not help to repel most moisture or beverage spills
May be too large to fit some 8-foot billiards table designs

customer_reviews.title: Much too large
customer_reviews.text: Bought to simply protect my billiard table. Very sadly, it is much too large for the table size in the description "Designed for 8 Foot Pool Table with Outside Measurement of 54.0" x 98.5"" Doesn't even grab around the table, just hangs over the table. In essence the elastic corners are useless because it's much too large. But keeping it because it cheaper than a sheet and too much effort to return and begin looking again.
customer_reviews.author: Thom

customer_reviews.title: Fits Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I have taken an old bar room pool table and put it in my basement. I wanted a cover for it to keep the dust off of it. It is a 6 foot table and this works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Bud Ford

customer_reviews.title: A gotta have.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cover. Looks great but more importantly, it fits great and is holding up well. Our cat is constantly on our table. Easy clean and strong materials.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph W.

customer_reviews.title: My Worst Purchase Ever (officially)
customer_reviews.text: Not for an 8 x 4 table and not Oxford cloth. This would better fit a 9' table. At best it is a extra thick disposal table cloth. It is plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Mark M.

customer_reviews.title: ... a 8 foot table and material is very thin like a disposable table cloth
customer_reviews.text: Way too big for a 8 foot table and material is very thin like a disposable table cloth. It has fitted corners that are useless because it is way too big
customer_reviews.author: david edmunds

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my husband's pool table, nice quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Author Gwen Cannon

customer_reviews.title: It's a little big for my 8 foot pool table ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a little big for my 8 foot pool table but it does the job so I kept it. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Emily S

customer_reviews.title: overpriced and smells funny.
customer_reviews.text: Just cheap plastic made in China, overpriced and smells funny.
customer_reviews.author: Doobie Do

customer_reviews.title: it will do just fine.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and does the job. Probably will not stand up to pets that jump on the table or heavy abuse from drunk people. However for normal use, it will do just fine.
customer_reviews.author: driven168

customer_reviews.title: Works ok. The main reason for us getting this ...
customer_reviews.text: Works ok. The main reason for us getting this was to keep the cat hair off the table and that it does.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff F

customer_reviews.title: Not Oxford Cloth...
customer_reviews.text: NOT oxford cloth. No cloth at all! It's thin vinyl. Quit falsely advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Parkhurst

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: pretty cheaply made. doesn't fit tightly on my table and is only moderately water resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Jefft

customer_reviews.title: This cover is Very thin and does not look good on the table
customer_reviews.text: This cover is Very thin and does not look good on the table. The fact that it is black does not help
customer_reviews.author: Gary Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice but too big. I should have ordered smaller one. But it's a great quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of the non fitted covers better, but this one definitely stays on better than those.
customer_reviews.author: MJannazo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The person I gave this to was pleased with the construction and fit.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad cover for the price, serves the purpose of covering
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... product fit the table as described and is a good look for a pool table
customer_reviews.text: The product fit the table as described and is a good look for a pool table. For the price it is a good product but it is a cheaper material.
customer_reviews.author: Reid Holden

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect fit and just what was needed, better quality than my last cover and should last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Daniel Hoefer

customer_reviews.title: Too big, vinyl - not Oxford "cloth" (nothing cloth about it). But looks nice and was cheap
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars since it is not oxford nylon--it seems like vinyl. I measured my table and this should have fit it exactly--it was about 1-2 inches over the size listed--it's like they switched manufacturers but didn't change the stats. Works though and was cheap--so I kept it.
customer_reviews.author: Chanimal

customer_reviews.title: It works, but I wish it fit tighter so ...
customer_reviews.text: It works, but I wish it fit tighter so the wind doesn't blow it off when the garage door is open.
customer_reviews.author: Troy P.

product_meta.title: ttnight 8" / 9" Foot Rip Resistant Oxford Cloth Pool Table Billiard Cover Billiard Table Cover
feature_bullets: Made of Rip Resistant Cloth, Firm and Durable
Weight Corners Ensures Cover Stay on.
Perfect Protection, against spills, dust, dirt, and pets from damaging your billiard table
